title: Peculia
description: Peculia, the fifth book by Eisner Award-nominated Richard Sala, collects the stories - strange adventures of an even stranger girl - from the acclaimed comic book series Evil Eye. Follow the intrepid lass as she encounters zombies, witches, madmen, evil children, and all kinds of things that go bump in the night. Not unlike a Gothic Perils of Pauline, or Barbarella meets The Blair Witch, it's dark and bloody fun from the creator of MTV's Invisible Hands, and the author of The Ghastly Ones and The Chuckling Whatsit.Collects Evil Eye #1-9 and a brand new colour chapter Doll Parts.
author: Richard Sala
